name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is another fairly large update that should add a lot of fixes and core improvements to the mod. Such as the addition of a more thematic melee splash system, many skill improvements/changes, new item additions, and our usual round of bug fixes to even things out. Expect Demon Relics to be coming around the corner in the next update or two. I hope you guys have fun with the new upgrades until then, enjoy!

Along with the 0.9.9.8B Update, comes updates to some of our other custom programs also: D2RLaunch and The Vault. D2RLaunch has been updated to 2.4.2 to fix Vault updating and The Vault has been updated to 1.1.6 to fix many issues as well as update the item catalog. Please update both along with the mod files for best results. You may want to clear config data to re-generate the item catalog.
